name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Mastery Challenge Pack 2
summary: Jump back into Mastery Challenge with all-new rewards and trials that will put your mastery of melee, stealth, and ranged combat to the test. Pack 2 also includes a tense new boss fight, which ensures Eivor’s prowess can be rivalled by none. A spectacular array of new armour, weaponry, tattoos, and settlement cosmetics can be earned by proving your skills. Mastery Challenge Pack 2 introduces three new shrine locations tailored to your mastery task, as well as improved NPC behaviour and scoring. The latest update also concludes the narrative questline introduced with the original Mastery Challenge update.
